name: df-iso
body: |- wceq(ciso, cmpt(s0, ccat, ccom(cmpt(s1, universe, cdm(cv(s1))), cfv(cinv, cv(s0)))))
comment: Function returning the isomorphisms of the category ` c ` . Definition 3.8 of [Adamek] p. 28, and definition in [Lang] p. 54. (Contributed by FL, 9-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
